verses.roman:
vasudevas tu durmedhā
hanyatām āśv asattamaḥ
ugrasenaḥ pitā cāpi
sānugaḥ para-pakṣa-gaḥ

synonyms: vasudevaḥ—Vasudeva; tu—and furthermore; durmedhā—the foolish-minded; hanyatām—should be killed; āśu—immediately; asat-tamaḥ—the worst of the impure; ugrasenaḥ—Ugrasena; pitā—my father; ca api—also; sa—together with; anugaḥ—his followers; para—of the enemy; pakṣa-gaḥ—taking the side.
translation: Kill that most evil fool Vasudeva! And also kill my father, Ugrasena, along with his followers, who have all sided with our enemies!
